name: Healthyfied English Breakfast
description: Dive into a delicious makeover of the classic English breakfast, tailored for those seeking a high-protein, low-carb start to their day. With an aromatic combination of mushrooms, uncured bacon, and eggs all seasoned with Himalayan salt and a hint of coconut aminos, this 'Healthyfied English Breakfast' transforms traditional indulgence into a guilt-free pleasure. Perfect for anyone looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle without sacrificing taste.
recipeIngredient: 3  pat (1 inch sq, 1/2 inch high), Butter

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your skillet over medium heat and add 1 pat of butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Clean the mushrooms with a damp cloth and slice them.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Once the butter has melted, add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and saut√© for 5 minutes until they're browned and tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, whole milk, coconut aminos, and Himalayan salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In another skillet, melt 2 pats of butter over medium heat. Once melted, pour in the egg mixture and let it sit without stirring for 1 minute. Continue cooking for 3 minutes, gently pulling the eggs from the edge towards the center, until the eggs are softly set.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the cooked slices of uncured bacon in the microwave for about 20 seconds or in a skillet over medium heat for about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
